name: (ELSC) East London Stripper Collective
description: Fast-paced life drawing classes that feature strippers as models, incorporating high-octane aerial pole poses and audience participation. Aims to challenge stereotypes and create positive working conditions for their models.

name: Adrian Dutton Life Drawing
description: Lively drop-in life drawing classes suitable for all levels, run by professional artists Adrian Dutton and Mark Lovelace. Known for hands-on teaching, a warm atmosphere, and varied pose lengths.

name: North London Life Drawing
description: Relaxed and friendly drop-in life drawing sessions in North London. Suitable for all skill levels.

name: London Art Drawing
description: Run by Anna, these classes offer a nice atmosphere in a cafe setting with alcohol available. Friendly and suitable for various levels.

name: 2b Or not 2b
description: POC-led life drawing group focusing on celebrating marginalized bodies (POC, trans, disabled). Inclusive, relaxed environment suitable for all levels, collaborating with major institutions.

name: Covent Garden Life Drawing
description: Informal, untutored drop-in sessions across London locations like Holborn and Camden. Led by Silvina, known for a welcoming, sociable atmosphere and professional models.

name: London Drawing
description: Founded by Anne Noble-Partridge, London Drawing offers innovative life drawing and painting workshops, including sessions at major galleries like Tate Modern. All levels welcome.

name: London Bridge Life Drawing
description: Relaxed, drop-in life drawing sessions at the TRA Community Hall near London Bridge. Suitable for all abilities, featuring different models each week with varied pose lengths.

name: Leytonstone Life Drawing
description: Friendly and relaxed life drawing group meeting at the Leytonstone Social Club. Tailored for all skill levels with professional models and optional guidance.

name: Camberwell Life Drawing
description: Led by artist and model Tatiana Moressoni, offering untutored life drawing classes in a relaxed, bohemian atmosphere at venues like The Cambria.

name: Life Drawing Art
description: Online and in-person life drawing sessions run by Bruce Thomas. Features large rooms, tea/coffee, and extended sessions.

name: Soho Life Drawing
description: Weekly drop-in sessions at the Quaker Meeting House near Leicester Square. Welcoming atmosphere with professional models and a tea break.

name: Heskith Hubbard Art Society
description: London's largest life drawing society, established in 1930. Meets weekly at Mall Galleries for untutored sessions with live models for member artists.

name: Art of Isolation
description: Curated by artist Rod Kitson, originally an exhibition now hosting life drawing sessions in a dynamic mixed-use art space in South East London.

name: Stone Life Drawing
description: Monthly life drawing sessions in Leytonstone, providing materials and refreshments in a social setting.

name: Bare Life Drawing
description: Life drawing in a pub setting (Great North Wood Pub). Nice room, materials provided, with the host encouraging drawing exercises.

name: Croydon Life Drawing Group
description: Local life drawing group in East Croydon, likely community-led or tutored sessions.

name: Beehive Pub Tottenham
description: Local life drawing sessions at the Beehive Pub in Tottenham.

name: Kilburn Life Drawing
description: Life drawing sessions at the North London Tavern in Kilburn.

name: Ciro’s Life Drawing
description: Life drawing sessions at The Ivories in Islington.

name: Hampstead Life Drawing
description: Sessions at the Old White Bear in Hampstead.

name: Love2Sketch
description: Untutored life drawing sessions in a pub setting in Tooting. Fun, creative evenings for all skill levels with materials provided.

name: Sevenoaks Drawing Group
description: Friendly art club meeting fortnightly for various activities including life drawing, portraiture, and outdoor sketching.

name: Mandie Wilde
description: Classes at OPEN Ealing Art Centre, likely tutored or facilitated art sessions.

name: Freya’s Fast Poses – Creative Life Drawing
description: Dynamic life drawing sessions focusing on fast poses, hosted by the Dulwich Art Group.

name: Drink & Draw at The Grosvenor W7
description: Tutored life drawing classes in a pub setting in Ealing, combining instruction with a social drink.

name: Life Drawing at Jazzbourne
description: London's loveliest life drawing evening in a speakeasy bar, featuring live jazz, theatrical lighting, and cocktails.

name: Life Drawing with Anna at Artinc
description: Life drawing sessions facilitated by Anna at Artinc, Isleworth.

name: Life Drawing at the Estorick
description: Untutored life drawing sessions at the Estorick Collection museum, open to all levels and often related to current exhibitions.

name: Drop-in Portrait Drawing and Painting Sessions
description: Portrait drawing and painting sessions at Carmine Crimson Studios, fostering creativity for all skill levels.

name: Thamesmead Life Drawing
description: Untutored life drawing sessions in Thamesmead, aiming to bring art to the local community with professional models.

name: Neon Naked Life Drawing
description: Immersive UV light life drawing workshops where models use neon body paint and accessories in a glowing, body-positive atmosphere.

name: Scottish Borders Life Drawing
description: Good online drawing session. 3 hours duration.
